questions.question: What is Digital Money?
questions.answer: Digital Money is a cryptocurrency created to offer the best performance in financial transactions. The Digital Money blockchain is optimized to perform instant transactions at low cost through an easy to use interface. Our goal is to simplify the use of cryptographic currencies, facilitating and providing access to all people.

questions.question: How does Digital Money work?
questions.answer: Transactions are made between users using the balance of the wallets. Each transaction is recorded in a data store called blockchain. This register is public and the network is fully decentralized.

questions.question: What are the advantages of Digital Money over other means of payment?
answer: - 100% of the fees distributed to DM-Pay machine owners;
- Friendly wallet interface with customizable public key;

questions.question: How does the expansion plan work?
questions.answer: Digital Money's expansion plan has two stages. ICO Phase - 90% of the total collected during this stage will be distributed to users through a variable binary bonus with a daily win limit of US $ 1,000. Mainnet phase - After the launch of this phase, 100% of the transaction fees will be distributed to the owners of the DM-Pay machines. This feature aims to increase the use of digital money as a means of payment.

questions.question: Can Digital Money be mined?
questions.answer: No. All coins will be pre-extracted and the total amount issued will be defined in the first block registered on the blockchain, also known as Genesis, and no other currency will be created or extracted after the project is launched.

questions.question: Where do I buy Digital Money?
questions.answer: After registration, DMX can be purchased with Bitcoins through the official website during the ICO period.

questions.question: Where is the price of each coin?
questions.answer: The price varies according to the phases of private sale, pre-sale, public sale and main sale. The price of the coins during each phase will be US $ 0.25, US $ 0.45, US $ 0.65 and US $ 0.85 respectively.

questions.question: What is the minimum amount of coins I can buy?
questions.answer: A minimum of 125 coins to purchase.

questions.question: When will my coins be available?
questions.answer: During the ICO period, your coins are frozen for movement. After the end of this period, the Betanet phase begins, releasing the currency balance.

questions.question: How can I trade Digital Money?
questions.answer: Currencies can be used for transactions between users or traded in our decentralized exchange. Subsequently, Digital Money will also be included in other brokerages.

questions.question: How do I download the Digital Money wallet?
questions.answer: The wallet can be downloaded from the official website of Digital Money, in the downloads area.

questions.question: Is it possible to have more than one account?
questions.answer: No. During the ICO period, only one account per person will be allowed.

questions.question: How is the Digital Money network consensus reached?
questions.answer: The Digital Money blockchain has the PoS consensus system. In this type of validation that validates a block there is a user who needs to rent DM-Pay terminals. The DMPAY wallet is a node. The node that meets the minimum requirements can participate in the validation draw. For more information, see the Whitepaper in the downloads section of the website.

questions.question: How does the Digital Money reward work?
questions.answer: At Digital Money, the amount of fees charged for currency transactions is redistributed to DMPAY Portfolios.
